group_1.textRight: What's wrong, Jun?
It would have been fine to talk in the classroom,@since it's lunch break...

group_1.textLeft: I've got a kinda weird story, so I don't want@anyone else to overhear.

group_1.textRight: Weird story...?

group_1.textLeft: That account the Princess asked us to follow@yesterday...
I seem to know that girl...

group_1.textRight: Huh...? "Seem to"...?

group_1.textLeft: I don't remember it, but my back's in one of@the photos.
Sorry, I told you something weird...

group_1.textRight: No, I've been bothered by that account, too.
Shigure also mentioned that she seems to know that person...
And I also got a message from the instructor.@She wanted to know...
...if there were really only six of us who defeated@the Witch, or if we're forgetting anyone...

group_1.textLeft: I didn't come here to talk about horror stories...

group_1.textRight: But, everyone seems to be having a feeling@they forgot something...
I wonder if there's any way to remember...

group_1.textLeft: I couldn't remember even after seeing myself@in a photo.

group_1.textRight: Is this the picture you're referring to...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it was posted about a month ago.
Sure, I was hunting Witches in Takarazaki@around that time. But I was alone.
And I'm the one who appeared and said@"hallo, hallo" while thwarting crime.
I was trying to change who I was...well, that@should've been how it went...

group_1.textRight: Is that thing you're holding in the photo candy...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, y'know, it's like when you're in grade school@and you act all bad with cigarette chocolates.

group_1.textRight: I see, candy...
We should go to that candy shop in Sankyo,@the Tomorrow Shop.
Remember what you said?
No, I haven't gotten around to it yet.
I haven't seen her since I came back here...

group_1.textLeft: Why...? Are you waiting for something...?

group_1.textRight: I'm not sure...
I have a feeling I shouldn't go yet...
Like I can't approach... I feel like I'm missing@something...
It might not be enough...
But if you go there, you might find out what@you're missing.
Plus, the lady said, "the two of you"@are welcome to come by.
Maybe that other person is who we're forgetting.
I'll contact Shigure and Himena.
Let's meet up there today.
